text: Backlog z Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Kosmiczna barwa. Totalnie owocowe i gęste, ze smakowitą kwaśnością. Pyszne.
Sample @ MBCC 2017, Green session. Deep red pour with a small head. Tons of juicy raspberries, funk, leather, cranberries and some lime. Good!
[5/13/17] Draught at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Green session. Deep red, pink head. Huge juicy raspberries, sour, oak, funk, juicy, smooth, silky. Amazing.
Sample at MBCC 2017. Dark reddish with a pink head. Tart with raspberries, funk and some minerals. The body was almost full. Well hidden alcohol.
Sample at MBCC 2017. Powerfull smell of raspberries. Similar taste. Very tart, both fruity tart and fermented tart. Nice.
Sampled at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Dark ruby pour with a pink head. Tons of raspberries all over the place, lambic funk, mineral notes. Very nice.

Tap @ Mikkeller Beer Celebration 2017  
Czerwony kolor z piękno różową pianą. Piana okala całe szkło pozostawiając liczne wstęgi.
Aromat zdominowany przez kwaśne owoce. Czarna porzeczka, malina, lekka mineralność. W smaku sok z kwaśnych malin zmieszany z dżemem z porzeczek. W drugim rzucie delikatna stajnia i wiejskie klimaty. Pod spodem kapka drewna.
Umiarkowanie kwaśne, owocowe, super pijalne.
Rewelacja!

duft: frisk hindbær meget kraftig frugt sødme rød frugt 
smag citrus Lime meget kraftig hindbær rødvins noder vinøs. meget syrlig

0,05l from tap at mbcc green session shared by / with the crew. purple / dark brown color, small pinkish head. smells of blueberries, grassy, marzipan, nutty, some wood. very nice smell. full body, soft carbonation, slick moutfheel. tastes rather tense of blueberries, blueberry jam, nutty, grass, marzipan. finishes quite dry and medium sour with notes of blueberries, grass and some marzipan. very very nice one.

8, 4, 8, 3, 16

13.05.2017, tap @ MBCC:
Nice pink fizzy-creamy mediumlasting head, deep reddish color. Aroma is dry concentrated sour-ish fruity, raspberry syrup, raspberry candy, soda powder, berry skin, fruit stones, sour raspberries, grass. Taste is dry concentrated sour-ish fruity, very sour raspberries, raspberry syrup, raspberry candy, soda powder, vinegar, grass, minerals, oak, citrus acid. Medium bitterness, dry sour-ish mouthfeel. Very nice, the sourness really stings far back in the mouth.
Tap at mbcc17, copenhagen. Deep red color, reddish head. Aroma is sour punch of raspberries. Super sour raspberry taste, stables, farmhouse. Just excellent.

Pours murky raspberry with low pink head. Aroma of raspberries, raspberries and raspberries. Taste is rich tart raspberry with a somewhat lingering sour finish. Light and creamy body with average carbonation.

March 25, 2017. On tap at Mikkeller Stockholm. 
Murky red with a small off-white pinkish head. Aroma is lots of raspberries with earthy and leafy notes, some citrus and oak.
Taste is sour, fruity with a light sweetness. Medium bodied, dry yet juicy, soft carbonation. Dry and sour finish with a light berry sweetness beneath, lots of raspberries, some citrus, again a slight earthy note. 
Nice one.

Pours an intense dark red with a very low off white head. Aromas of raspberry, citrus, oak character. Taste is an insane amount of raspberries with sour notes. Mouthfeel is juicy and slushy with moderate carbonation.

Prominent raspberry aroma and deep sour persistent powerful raspberry taste, amazing rich satisfying mouthfeel, resonating raspberry fruity into the finish. Outrageously good.

Draught at Mikkeller & Friends.
Dark brown colored with a small off-white head.
Fruity and acidic aroma of raspberries and oak with notes of marmelade.
Acidic flavor of raspberries and oak.
Tart finish.

From tap. Pours pitch black/purple. Small pink head. Aroma is dense ribena raspberry. Sour and intense raspberry. Syrupy. Dense fruity, sour and citric. Lingering intense fruity. Sour and lingering fruity far finish.
